name: Pirates Mayhem
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN MODE FOR THE CORRECT RESOLUTION

Ever wondered what would happen if pirates got in a fight? Well, This game will tell you that.

Pirates Mayhem is a Local Multiplayer game supporting up to 4 players. You`ll battle your friends in tiny maps until one last person survives. But be careful because cannons and water will spawn to kill you!

The game is for free and development will continue later .  I will appreciate it if you donate a dollar or two to me.
